name: Arbitrage Receiver
description: Receives arbitrage opportunities from pipeline with configurable threshold filtering. Connect to Imagen or Telegram nodes to send alerts.

outputs.name: opportunity
outputs.description: Arbitrage opportunity data (pair, exchanges, prices, spread)

settings.name: cooldownSeconds
settings.label: Cooldown (seconds)
settings.description: Minimum seconds between alerts for the same pair

settings.name: filterPairs
settings.label: Filter Pairs (comma-separated)
settings.description: Only alert for these pairs (e.g., BTC,ETH,SOL). Empty = all pairs

settings.name: filterExchanges
settings.label: Filter Exchanges (comma-separated)
settings.description: Only alert for these exchanges (e.g., Binance,Bybit). Empty = all
